data.text: @palkisu I simply do not understand why we are tolerating his idiosyncratic ways & flippant statements being reeled by him off & on. He is the villain of piece for our ups& downs in our relationship with China
@palkisu What is the problem? Doesn't he have a right to say that? Or is the problem, not the person talking but the topic of discussion?
@palkisu Palki, you have to focus more on your analysis, questioning and reasoning.
@palkisu Jio TV says "This channel curently unavailable" 🤔😠
@palkisu Yr going nuts yr turning into Arnab Goswami .. Stop smoking crack

@palkisu i find dalai lama too politically correct, he wants to be in the good books of lefties and at the same time want to be some kind of liberal, he hesitantly agrees on acceptance for china, or religion of peace or other issues in contrast to buddhism, reluctant phoophaji types
@palkisu I think his holiness Dalai Lama is under influence of RSS now
